body: Fuck. It is easy to understand even without any translations. Such wonderful art and my fave pair. They're everything.
Oh my god Im not even into yaoi pairings in general but this is just one of those instances that the art is just so fucking beautiful and hot

Please translate this one!! Even if I die!!😂 I really like this one and I want to know what they're saying please!!!
